TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskDialogButton extends System.Windows.Forms.TaskDialogControl

summary.span: 表示任务对话框的按钮控件。

span.span: Represents a button control of a task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮可以是标准按钮 (其文本由 OS) 提供，或自定义按钮 (或命令链接) ，你可以在其中提供自己的文本。A button can either be a standard button (whose text is provided by the OS), or a custom button (or command link) where you can provide your own text. 静态 getter 检索的实例 ，如标准按钮。 instances retrieved by static getters like are standard buttons. 无法设置其属性，因为在对话框中显示这些按钮时，操作系统将为这些按钮提供本地化文本。Their property cannot be set as the OS will provide the localized text for the buttons when showing them in the dialog. 用其中一个构造函数创建的按钮实例是自定义按钮，它们允许您将自己的文本作为按钮标签提供。Button instances created with one of the constructors are custom buttons, which allow you to provide your own text as button label. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时显示自定义按钮和命令链接 ( 实例) -它只是一个或另一个。It's not possible to show both custom buttons and command links ( instances) at the same time - it's only one or the other. 在任一情况下，都可以将它们与标准按钮组合在一起。In either case, you can combine them with standard buttons.

public: static property System::Windows::Forms::TaskDialogButton ^ Cancel { System::Windows::Forms::TaskDialogButton ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示取消按钮的标准 实例。

span.span: Gets a standard instance representing the Cancel button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注意：添加 "取消" 按钮会自动将 "关闭" 按钮添加到任务对话框的标题栏，并将允许通过按 ESC 或 Alt + F4 (关闭该对话框，就像启用 ) 一样。Note: Adding a Cancel button will automatically add a close button to the task dialog's title bar and will allow to close the dialog by pressing ESC or Alt+F4 (just as if you enabled ).

summary.span: 在单击按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，该对话框将在事件处理程序返回后关闭 (除了 按钮，该按钮稍后会引发 事件) 。By default, the dialog will be closed after the event handler returns (except for the button, which instead will raise the event afterwards). 若要防止在单击此按钮时关闭对话框，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent the dialog from closing when this button is clicked, set the property to `false`.

exception.span: 该属性是在当前绑定到任务对话框的按钮上设置的，但该对话框刚刚开始导航到另一个页面。

span.span: The property is set on a button that is currently bound to a task dialog, but the dialog has just started navigating to a different page.

exception.span: 此按钮实例当前未绑定到任务对话框。

span.span: This button instance is not currently bound to a task dialog.

exception.span: - 或 - 任务对话框已开始导航到包含此按钮实例的新页面，但尚未引发 事件。

span.span: - or - The task dialog has started navigating to a new page containing this button instance, but the event has not been raised yet.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在按钮附近显示用户帐户控制 (UAC) 盾牌图标；也就是说，该按钮调用的操作是否需要提升权限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the User Account Control (UAC) shield icon should be shown near the button; that is, whether the action invoked by the button requires elevation.

value.span: 若要显示 UAC 盾牌图标，则为;否则为 。

span.span: to show the UAC shield icon; otherwise, .
The default value is .

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
The text associated with this control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此按钮为标准按钮，则不能设置此属性，因为操作系统会提供其文本。You cannot set this property if this button is a standard button, as its text will be provided by the OS. `null`显示或导航对话框时，此属性不能为或空字符串; 否则，操作将失败。This property must not be `null` or an empty string when showing or navigating the dialog; otherwise, the operation will fail.

exception.span: 设置属性，此按钮实例为标准按钮，其文本由 OS 提供。

span.span: The property is set and this button instance is a standard button, for which the text is provided by the OS.

exception.span: - 或 - 设置属性，此按钮实例当前绑定到任务对话框。

span.span: - or - The property is set and this button instance is currently bound to a task dialog.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在显示任务对话框时是否应显示此 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this should be shown when displaying the task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为， `false` 则仍可接收 事件 (例如，在将 设置为) 时 ，或调用方法（ 即使未显示该按钮）。Setting this property to `false` allows you to still receive the event (e.g. for the button when is set), or to call the method even if the button is not shown.

exception.span: 属性已设置，此按钮实例当前已绑定到任务对话框。

span.span: The property is set and this button instance is currently bound to a task dialog.
